be.tomvertommen.drinksMachineClient.service
Class DrinksMachineService

java.lang.Object
  be.tomvertommen.drinksMachineClient.service.DrinksMachineService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDrinksMachineService
public class DrinksMachineService
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDrinksMachineService

Reference implementation from IDrinksMachineService Can only be instantiated once. Connects to the DrinksMachine server and reconnects if needed. Sends XML Request over TCP/IP and returns the received Reply host and port are configurable in application.properties

Author:
Tom Vertommen
